archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0297
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a prospective customer, I want to be able to view recommended broadband services based on my household needs, so that I can make a purchase that meets my needs.

properties.value: 3-5 questions to understand customer usage needs and match with technology available. To be checked at Comarch internally if functionality available.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
